alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:34PM CDT until June 15 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SUNFLOWER...SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 934 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Moorhead to Isola to near Arcola, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Moorhead and Isola around 940 PM CDT. Murphy around 950 PM CDT. Belzoni around 1005 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
